meanings: (선반 등의) the top, the upper shelf, the upper part[section]
put fish on the top shelf of the fridge

vlive.korean: 이제 저의 트위터에 상단 배너라고 그러나요? are going to be used for my Twitter upper banner image? Is that what it's called? 듣기 View video WOODZ (조승연) : 🧡조우즈vs조승연💙
vlive.english: are going to be used for my Twitter upper banner image? Is that what it's called?

vlive.korean: 오른쪽 상단바? The advice bar on the right side? 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 연-락
vlive.english: The advice bar on the right side?

vlive.korean: 위에 상단바를 내리시고요. Make sure the window is open. 듣기 View video Hong Jin Young : 갓떼리언니 오랜만~♡
vlive.english: Make sure the window is open.

vlive.korean: 상단바를 내리면 날짜 있잖아요. Open a window bar upper right to see the date. 듣기 View video Hong Jin Young : 갓떼리언니 오랜만~♡
vlive.english: Open a window bar upper right to see the date.

vlive.korean: 뭐라고? 오른쪽 상단바를 보라고? What? Look at the advice bar on the right side? 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 연-락
vlive.english: What? Look at the advice bar on the right side?

examples.korean: Do you want your address printed at the top of the letter? 발음듣기 당신 주소를 편지 상단에 인쇄하길 원하세요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Do you want your address printed at the top of the letter? 발음

examples.korean: a pull-down menu 발음듣기 풀다운 메뉴(화면 상단에 표시되는 기본 메뉴) Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
Write your name at the top of the page. 발음듣기 페이지의 상단에 이름을 쓰시오 Neungyule
examples.english: Write your name at the top of the page. 발음

examples.korean: I put my bag on the overhead rack. 발음듣기 상단의 선반에 가방을 올려놓았다. Neungyule
examples.english: I put my bag on the overhead rack. 발음

examples.korean: I was responsible for watching for black marks in the upper-right-hand corner of the screen. 발음듣기 화면의 오른쪽 상단에 검정 마크가 나오는지 지켜보는 것이 제 임무였습니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I was responsible for watching for black marks in the upper-right-hand corner of the screen. 발음
